item.title: Math
item.author: silverhugh.77@gmail.com (Mr. Blue)
item.description: Math notes. Linear Algebra Pythagorean means Pythagorean means （毕达哥拉斯的平均数） include: arithmetic mean geometric mean harmonic mean Arithmetic mean The definition of arithmetic mean （算术平均数） is: $$ AM = \frac1n (x_1 + x_2 + \cdots + x_n) $$ Geometric mean The definition of geometric mean （几何平均数） is: $$ GM = \sqrt[n]{|x_1 \cdot x_2 \cdot \cdots \cdot x_n|} $$ Harmonic mean The definition of harmonic mean (调和平均数) is:
